english.segment1: I've been feeling kind of sick to my stomach. Its just a gimmick but the kids seem to love it. And if youre patient you can witness the sell-out. Im not a killer but Hollywood's gonna drown
english.segment2: And if youre feeling original. Dont let it go to your head. Its all been done before. Youre not the first one. Youre not the first one
english.segment3: And theres a rumor creeping into my ears. That we've been changing how our image appears. And Ill be the first one, not the last one. To tell you images in mirrors arent as big as you hear. Until those who doubt. A bitter taste lingering in my mouth. Im not a trophy, Im just a show fiend
english.segment4: Hold out your hand now baby close your eyes. Im gonna take you on a journey tonight. They say Im addicted to the spotlight (Oh no). Ive got a feeling they may be right. Hold out your hand now baby close your eyes. I'll take you on a journey if the feeling's right. They say Im addicted to the spotlight (Oh no). Ive got a feeling they may be right
english.segment5: And you leave the people wondering. You leave the children wanting a popular attitude. You wont admit its to flatter you. And if youre feeling original. Dont let it go to your head. Its all been done before. Youre not the first one. Youre not the first one
english.segment6: Again and again and again and again..
english.segment7: Hold out your hand now baby close your eyes. Im gonna take you on a journey tonight. They say Im addicted to the spotlight (Oh no). Ive got a feeling they may be right. Hold out your hand now baby close your eyes. I'll take you on a journey if the feeling's right. They say Im addicted to the spotlight (Oh no). Ive got a feeling they may be right. Ive got a feeling they may be right
english.segment8: And Ive found the key. The spotlight fiend. And Im breaking you down to your shaking knees. And Ive found the key. The spotlight fiend. And Im breaking you down to your shaking knees.
